mapper.select: SELECT MEM_EMAIL, MEM_NAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_INFORM_AGREE, MEM_GRADE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NUM=#{MEM_NUM} AND MEM_DEL_GB = 'N'
SELECT MEM_PW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_EMAIL = #{MEM_EMAIL} AND MEM_DEL_GB='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS RESERVATION_COUNT FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_USER = #{MEM_NUM} AND RESERVATION_DEL_GB = 'N' AND RESERVATION_STATUS = '픽업 대기중'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_DEL_GB = 'Y', MEM_DEL_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_NUM=#{MEM_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT B.BRAND_NAME, T.TOTAL_GOODS_NAME, T.TOTAL_GOODS_MODEL, T.TOTAL_GOODS_PRICE, GI.GOODS_IMAGE_STD, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GOODS_LIKE_NUM DESC) AS NUM FROM BRAND B, TOTAL_GOODS T, GOODS_LIKE G, GOODS_IMAGE GI WHERE B.BRAND_NUM = T.TOTAL_GOODS_BRAND AND GI.GOODS_IMAGE_PARENT = T.TOTAL_GOODS_NUM AND G.GOODS_LIKE_USER= #{MEM_NUM} AND T.TOTAL_GOODS_NUM = GOODS_LIKE_PRONUM AND T.TOTAL_GOODS_DEL_GB = 'N' AND GI.GOODS_IMAGE_ORDER= 1 ) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{START} AND #{END}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS GOODS_LIKE_COUNT FROM GOODS_LIKE WHERE GOODS_LIKE_USER=#{MEM_NUM}
